title: BBQ Remoulade
directions: Whisk together the mayonnaise, mustard, barbecue sauce, cornichons and green onions in a medium bowl. Season with salt and pepper, cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour to allow the flavors to meld.
ingredients: 3 tablespoons prepared barbecue sauce, such as Bobby Flay Mesa Grill BBQ Sauce
2 green onions, green and pale green parts, finely diced
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
